body.p:
Hd Qrts 5th Ky Battery
Lexington. Ky. Jan 26"/65
To His Excellency
T. E. Bramlette.
Governor of Ky..
Sir,

I have the honor to respectfully recommend Quartermaster Sergeant Frank G. Clark of Battery 'E' 1st Ky Light Art. as @ good Soldier ever faithful in performance of duty energetic and capable of performing the duties of an officer..
He is also @ Gentlemanly and polite young man.

I am Sir very Respecty
Your obt servt
Samuel.A. Miller
2nd Lieut Battery 'E' 1st Ky Lt Art.

Hd. qrs. 5" Ky Battery
Lexington Ky
Jany. 26" 1865
Miller Samuel A.
2d Lt. Batt. E.
Recommends Q. M. Sgt. Frank G. Clark as worthy of promotion --
Recd A. G. O. Ky 27 Jany 1865
